timeline.bodyText: ❓ Are these the right fields to include?
timeline.author: emmberk

replies.bodyText: That's what I would have done 👍
replies.author: bakejeyner

timeline.bodyText: ❓ Are these the right fields to include?
timeline.author: emmberk

replies.bodyText:
Personally I would have included all of the fields:
properties
textualProperties
gmlProperties
temporalProperties
featureType
nonQueryableProperties
gmlNamespace
schema
replies.author: bakejeyner

replies.bodyText: Looks like we populate the properties, textualProperties, gmlProperties, and temporalProperties from the schema, so I think it makes to just check the schema so long as equality guarantees that the above also are equal. Do you know if that's guaranteed?
replies.author: SmithJosh

replies.bodyText: I don't know if it's guaranteed 🤷‍♀️ I'm going to stick with this for now because it's low risk.
replies.author: emmberk
